verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
You are who you are yesterday, Today and
forever more
What you say is what you do
You never fail you never change
you are faithful to the end....
faithful God i worship you.....

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You are too faithful to fail me
You are too faithful to disappoint me
you've proven yourself in my life and have come to realize
That you are too faithful to fail me
